item.description:
What: Fiesta

When: January 12, 2010 7:00 PM

Where:
Farmington Library
6 MONTEITH DR Community Room
Farmington, CT 06032
860.673.6791

Please join us for our monthly potluck fiesta! Meet new friends who share your interest in improving or maintaining language skills. This (mostly) Spanish conversation is a fiesta. Bring a SMALL amount of food to share. If you can, let us know in your RSVP what you'll bring. Hope to see you there!

Some of the meetups will be potlucks with conversation and some will have a theme or event. We are seeking meetup ideas and presenters for the theme meetups. If you can present a program for one of our meetups, please contact Karen or Kurt. Perhaps you could lead a poetry reading, present a game night in Spanish, teach Latin Dancing, speak about a country where Spanish is spoken, etc. Contact Karen at kdwo543210@yahoo.com or Kurt at gringo50@peru.com. Use the Message Board to discuss ideas and brainstorm.

Â¡Nos vemos!

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fiesta
